name: @localtaskrepo/lotar
description: A task and project management tool that runs locally and can be synced via repo

scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:rust
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:agent: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; export NO_COLOR=1 FORCE_COLOR=0 CARGO_TERM_COLOR=never; npm run lint:frontend; cargo clippy --all-targets --all-features --color never -- -D warnings'
scripts.test: npm run test:rust && npm run test:ui
scripts.test:agent: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; npm run test:rust:agent; npm run test:ui:agent'
scripts.test:rust:agent: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; export NO_COLOR=1 FORCE_COLOR=0 CARGO_TERM_COLOR=never; cargo nextest run --cargo-profile ci --color never --failure-output immediate-final --retries 0 "$@"' --
scripts.test:ui:agent: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; export NO_COLOR=1 FORCE_COLOR=0; vitest run --config view/vitest.config.ts --reporter dot --no-color "$@"' --
scripts.test:smoke: npm run build && vitest run --config smoke/vitest.config.ts
scripts.test:smoke:agent: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; export NO_COLOR=1 FORCE_COLOR=0 CARGO_TERM_COLOR=never; npm run build; vitest run --config smoke/vitest.config.ts --reporter dot --no-color "$@"' --
scripts.test:smoke:quick:agent: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; export NO_COLOR=1 FORCE_COLOR=0; vitest run --config smoke/vitest.config.ts --reporter dot --no-color "$@"' --
scripts.smoke:ui: npm run build:web && bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; bin="${LOTAR_BINARY_PATH:-${LOTAR_BIN:-}}"; if [ -z "$bin" ]; then case "$(uname -s)" in MINGW*|MSYS*|CYGWIN*) bin="target/release/lotar.exe" ;; *) bin="target/release/lotar" ;; esac; fi; case "$bin" in /*) ;; *) bin="$PWD/$bin" ;; esac; if [ ! -f "$bin" ]; then echo "LoTaR binary not found at: $bin" >&2; echo "Run npm run build:rust once, or set LOTAR_BINARY_PATH to a built binary." >&2; exit 1; fi; LOTAR_BINARY_PATH="$bin" LOTAR_WEB_UI_EMBEDDED=0 LOTAR_WEB_UI_PATH="$PWD/target/web" npm run test:smoke:quick'

author: Ravi Gairola <mallox@pyxzl.net>
